channel.title: Problem! 317 pi
channel.description:
hey guys i got a problem to add rsa i did everything in the tutorial but when i try to login its keep saying cant connect to the server. Can some 1 help me in teamviewer or skype?
screenshots client side: [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/142tr2x.jpg[/img]
server side codes: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/122lnpe.jpg[/img]
server side coding: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2ds4uhy.jpg[/img]
Skype: Fr0zentiddo Teamviewer: I send you message for is and pass
Tnx!

item.title: Problem! 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sbruinsma77 sbruinsma77
item.description:
@sbruinsma77 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:12, topic:547669”][quote author=sbruinsma77 link=topic=666575.msg4457567#msg4457567 date=1415773703]
is it possible that is doesnt work becuase im on the ip 0.0.0.0/localhost
[/quote]
Shouldn’t be an issue to be on localhost.[/quote]

can you maybe help me in teamviewer? just take a look?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem! 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

sbruinsma77:

is it possible that is doesnt work becuase im on the ip 0.0.0.0/localhost

Shouldn’t be an issue to be on localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem! 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sbruinsma77 sbruinsma77
item.description:
@sbruinsma77 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:547669”][quote author=sbruinsma77 link=topic=666575.msg4457518#msg4457518 date=1415744378]

I’d try regenerating the keys, because it should work with everything. Unless the problem isn’t even related to your RSA keys, then you have more things to look for…

i generated my codes with the rsa code generator in the tutorial.

What kind of things then?

A lot?
I can’t just magically know… If it’s not related to RSA then you have literally hundreds of options…
Double check the IP for the client.
Make sure the data being sent from the client is the same that’s being read.
Make sure the server is on…
Etc…

it is becuase when i take the codes for rsa away i just can login and do everything. I had this server up but becuase there hackers with reflection client i need to protect my server and client so i had to put it down badly.
[/quote]
Then it’d be the keys…[/quote]

is it possible that is doesnt work becuase im on the ip 0.0.0.0/localhost

Read full topic

I can’t just magically know… If it’s not related to RSA then you have literally hundreds of options…

it is becuase when i take the codes for rsa away i just can login and do everything. I had this server up but becuase there hackers with reflection client i need to protect my server and client so i had to put it down badly.[/quote]
Then it’d be the keys…

item.title: Problem! 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sbruinsma77 sbruinsma77
item.description:
@sbruinsma77 wrote:

[/quote]
Is the client sending the keys, make sure the doKeys method is called in the client.
[/quote]

stream.writeWordBigEndian(10); stream.writeDWord(ai[0]); stream.writeDWord(ai[1]); stream.writeDWord(ai[2]); stream.writeDWord(ai[3]); stream.writeDWord(/*signlink.uid*/999999); stream.writeString(s); stream.writeString(s1); stream.doKeys(); aStream_847.currentOffset = 0; if(flag) aStream_847.writeWordBigEndian(18); else aStream_847.writeWordBigEndian(16); aStream_847.writeWordBigEndian(stream.currentOffset + 36 + 1 + 1 + 2); aStream_847.writeWordBigEndian(255); aStream_847.writeWord(317);

Read full topic

item.title: Problem! 317 pi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“sbruinsma77, post:3, topic:547669”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666575.msg4456827#msg4456827 date=1415371675]
Double check that your RSA keys (public & private) are correct.
Also make sure that you turned all the get * methods to the new rsaBuffer…
[/quote]

i did, i also used new codes still not working ???[/quote]
Is the client sending the keys, make sure the doKeys method is called in the client.

Read full topic
